# RTumblr

<!-- badges: start -->
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/RTumblr)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=RTumblr)
<!-- badges: end -->

RTumblr is a wrapper for the official Tumblr API. (An [existing CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/tumblR/index.html) package has been archived)

## Installation

You can install the development version of RTumblr like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("schochastics/RTumblr")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example, eval = FALSE}
library(RTumblr)
## basic example code
```
